page.title: 05FACILITIES IN BALDERTON
page.content: In Balderton there are 2 churches, one Methodist and one Anglican. There is a small precinct containing a mini-supermarket, a pet shop, a shoe shop,hairdressers, a Chinese take away and a sweetshop.There are a number of pubs and one large supermarket. There is a Youth Club,a large sports centre, one secondary school called the Grove,and two primary schools. Balderton has a Parish Council which is elected every four years. There are lots of fundraising events and jumble sales as well as sporting activities. On St.Georges' Day (23rd.April) the local Girl Guides,Boy Scouts,Brownies and Cubs parade through the streets of the village.
